channel.description:
If your looking for this Project it was deleted before but has now been started again with even more updates. You can see that development at this link.
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,489807.0.html http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,489807.0.html http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,489807.0.html

item.title: Project Cleanup [317 Cleaned base for new coders] [v1.25][Fixed cache]
item.dc:creator: @nicke924 nicke924
item.description:
@nicke924 wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:201, topic:368374”][quote author=rova1 link=topic=464527.msg3454027#msg3454027 date=1293934792]

Why do people quote someone and not add anything at all? I know it means “I agree” or “what he said^”. I’ve also seen it as “+1”. Just seems really pointless is all…
[/quote]

It doesn’t matter if it’s pointless, people do it, and you cannot stop them; If he wants to do it, it’s his choice.[/quote]
Or her choise.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Viety Viety
item.description:
@Viety wrote:

Well, here’s my opinion on your quiting.
It’s a worthy decision. Although to quit because of some lousy staff is well kinda dum. I don’t think that’s the real reason you quit, but if it is then why not just find some better staff haha? Whatever though, like many of the expierenced users of this website said, you had a lot of potential but i guess like the average human you’ll never know how far you can go. Good luck to you.

Read full topic

@shnk wrote:

WHAT THE FUCK I FOLLOWED THIS EVERYDAY WAITING FOR NEW UPDATES AND WAITING FOR THAT PERFECT BASE TO START OFF FROM BUT YOU FUCKERS PISSED OFF ANDREW SO NOW I CANT DO SHIT… FUCK YOU ALLLLLLLLLLL!!!

item.source: Project Cleanup [317 Cleaned base for new coders] [v1.25][Fixed cache]

item.title: Project Cleanup [317 Cleaned base for new coders] [v1.25][Fixed cache]
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“Kaex, post:193, topic:368374”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=464527.msg3445627#msg3445627 date=1293413234]

If your a beginner, then good job (: If not, I don’t understand why you would use a Delta base, would have been nice to have seen this done to an Emulous or something.

By reading this statement I clearly saw you didn’t realize what this development is for. This is updates to the Delta base to make it more stable for new coders so we can start seeing some better server releases.
[/quote]

We moved on from Delta for a reason. Use your head /facepalm.[/quote]
Take a look around the download section, now does it look like really “moved on” from delta. I can only guess you are one of those people who sit around and dis delta servers because you want to sound cool but the fact is that a server is what you make it. A delta can be (and has been in the past) as stable as any other server out their, theres just a bad stereotypic that deltas are bad servers because so many people load them up with crappy customs and broken methods and such. Hence the creation of this project.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Cleanup [317 Cleaned base for new coders] [v1.25][Fixed cache]
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

abtekk:

This could go far. What your doing could really help new programmers. I really like it :). Good luck in the future.

Thank you I will be working alot on the project this weekend after I get my Christmas shopping done, so Ill probably release about 10 or more updates. Im thinking about continuing V2 with no customs and the original 377 cache, I will still offer v1+ as a download but I probably wont work that much on it. The only custom I want the game to really have is skillcapes and dragon claws, but im going to have it load those threw the cache

Read full topic

item.title: Project Cleanup [317 Cleaned base for new coders] [v1.25][Fixed cache]
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“RuneSpace, post:8, topic:368594”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=464527.msg3426213#msg3426213 date=1291943761]

Out of all of those that you listed only 2 of them are problems in the server and thats the jframe and the 459 gameframe, I like my gameframe and i wanna keep it lol, Look inside servers before you judge but thanks for posting.

Just trying to help you out, I prefer to play without Jframe and the 474 gameframe is in my eyes overused.
But you did an great job tough, if you would add most of the suggestions I listed and get rid of the customs I think everyone would use your source, bye bye PI

So you guys don’t want customs? You want the old 377 cache unchanged? I can do that
[/quote]

Bad andrew…

He is one person, Dont let his opinion change what you are doing. Its your source, not his

If you are gonna have an unchanged 317/377 cache, post a poll and see who wants it.[/quote]
Lol true, and congratz on your 200 rep mate

Read full topic

Out of all of those that you listed only 2 of them are problems in the server and thats the jframe and the 459 gameframe, I like my gameframe and i wanna keep it lol, Look inside servers before you judge but thanks for posting.
[/quote]

Just trying to help you out, I prefer to play without Jframe and the 474 gameframe is in my eyes overused.
But you did an great job tough, if you would add most of the suggestions I listed and get rid of the customs I think everyone would use your source, bye bye PI :D[/quote]
So you guys don’t want customs? You want the old 377 cache unchanged? I can do that
